attributes.description: Internal identifier of the user instance.
attributes.name: instanceId

attributes.description: Unique identifier of the systemTime instance. Because systemTime is a singleton resource type, the value of this field is always 0.
attributes.name: id

attributes.description: Indicates whether to reboot the system after modifying the system time. A reboot is required if the time shift exceeds 1000 seconds.
attributes.name: rebootPrivilege
